scripts.predeploy: (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build) && (cd functions/infrastructure/ecr && npm install) && (cd infrastructure && npm install)
scripts.deploy: (cd functions/infrastructure/ecr && npm run deploy) && (cd functions/infrastructure/docker && npm run deploy) && (cd infrastructure && npm run deploy)
scripts.destroy: (cd ml_services && bash endpoint_names.sh && python3 delete_endpoints.py) && (cd infrastructure && cdk destroy)
